questionList.question: Let's talk about mathematics. How good are you with them?
questionList.answerThree: I definitely use my phone to do a simple calculation.
questionList.answerFour: Hey! No bad words here please.

questionList.question: Today is the D-day, your wedding! What are you doing right now?
questionList.answerOne: Checking if each floral centerpiece is composed precisely of 12 pink roses, 8 purple lisianthus and 5 different sprawling branches, weights exactly 749 grams AND, of course, if they are perfectly centered on the table.
questionList.answerTwo: Checking if the last deliveries are in, if all the staff has arrived, if the DJ has got the right music for your 1st dance, etc.
questionList.answerThree: Sipping margaritas, your wedding planner is in charge of everything.
questionList.answerFour: You barely check if your soon-to-be husband/wife is present...

questionList.question: What was your favorite toy as a kid?
PROBLEM SOLVING & CRITICAL THINKER
questionList.answerThree: If you don't like problem solving at all... Forget about working in tech lol
questionList.answerFour: If you don't like problem solving at all... Forget about working in tech lol

questionList.question: You're hungry, you open your fridge and notice you only have a bunch of random ingredients.
questionList.answerOne: You try and make something new with what is available.
questionList.answerTwo: You ask everyone's best friend what can you do with what you already have (Google, you ask Google!)
questionList.answerThree: Decide on a specific recipe and go straight to the nearest shop to buy what's missing to cook it.
questionList.answerFour: 'I'll get a Pepperoni pizza with extra cheese, thanks. 20 minutes is perfect, see you soon!'

questionList.question: Your beloved kitchen stand mixer does not work anymore. What's your first move?
questionList.answerOne: You've already removed the external parts and are checking the wires, the engine and other components. I mean, it should not be that complicated, right?
questionList.answerTwo: Check on Google's cousin if someone else's has had this issue and what's the fix (YouTube, Google's cousin is YouTube, OBVI!)
questionList.answerThree: Call in a repair the repairman and watch from far what he does and how he fixes it.
questionList.answerFour: Buy a new one, no time for all that!

questionList.question: You've decided to remodel your bedroom. How do you do it ?
questionList.answerOne: You design mood boards of different styles, draw multiple sketches, spend countless hours on Pinterest and Instagram for inspiration, create spreadsheets and order a plethora of color samples for the paint.
questionList.answerTwo: Couple of sketches, few paint color samples, one spreadsheet and we're good to go!
questionList.answerThree: You try 2 different shades of your favorite color on the wall, pick one aaand that's about it.
questionList.answerFour: You buy stuff that you like, when you see them, and they will fit in the room anyway.
